text.div:
MaxDegreeInvasionBowelWall

A code that indicates the maximum degree of local invasion into or through the bowel wall

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/max-deg-invasion-bowel, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
pT1 pT1 Tumour invades submucosa
pT2 pT2 Tumour invades muscularis propria
pT3 pT3 Tumour invades through muscularis propria into pericolorectal tissues
pT4a pT4a Tumour penetrates to the surface of the visceral peritoneum
pT4b pT4b Tumour directly invades or is adherent to other organs or structures

name: MaxDegreeInvasionBowelWall
description: A code that indicates the maximum degree of local invasion into or through the bowel wall

concept.display: pT3 Tumour invades through muscularis propria into pericolorectal tissues
